short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans URLs using VirusTotal API before opening them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InnoShield is your first line of defense against malicious websites, phishing attempts, and online threats. This powerful extension automatically scans URLs before you visit them, providing real-time protection against potentially harmful websites.

Key Features:
✓ Real-time URL Safety Scanning
- Automatically checks URLs before you visit them
- Powered by VirusTotal's comprehensive security database
- Instant threat detection and warning system

✓ Comprehensive Protection
- Detects malware, phishing sites, and suspicious domains
- Warns against potentially harmful websites
- Provides detailed threat information

✓ User-Friendly Interface
- Clear, actionable security warnings
- Easy-to-understand threat descriptions
- Option to proceed with caution when needed

✓ Privacy-Focused
- No personal data collection
- Transparent URL checking process
- Regular security updates

✓ Lightweight & Fast
- Minimal impact on browsing speed
- Works silently in the background
- No noticeable delay in page loading

How It Works:
1. When you click a link or enter a URL, InnoShield automatically checks it against VirusTotal's security database
2. If a threat is detected, you'll receive an immediate warning
3. Detailed information about the potential threat is provided
4. You can choose to proceed or return to safety

Perfect for:
• Security-conscious users
• Online shoppers
• Business professionals
• Anyone concerned about online safety

Stay safe online with InnoShield - Your trusted guardian against malicious websites.

Note: This extension requires permission to analyze URLs for security threats. All URL checking is done through VirusTotal's secure API.
